overview: The first thrilling investigative series on Indian Television, is today one of the most popular shows on Sony Entertainment Television. Dramatic and absolutely unpredictable, Crime Investigation Department (C.I.D.) has captivated viewers over the last eleven years and continues to keep audiences glued to their television sets with its thrilling plots and excitement. Also interwoven in its fast-paced plots are the personal challenges that the C.I.D. team faces with non-stop adventure, tremendous pressure and risk, all in the name of duty. The series consists of hard-core police procedural stories dealing with investigation, detection and suspense. The protagonists of the serial are an elite group of police officers belonging to the Crime Investigation Department of the police force, led by ACP Pradyuman.
name: C.I.D.

overview: From pulling off casting coups to calming celebrity egos, the drama never stops for four Mumbai talent agents hustling to save their sinking company.
name: Call My Agent Bollywood

overview: The scheming Mallikajaan rules over an elite house of courtesans — but a new rival threatens her reign as rebellion brews in British-ruled India.
name: Heeramandi

overview: Years after a disastrous job in Baluchistan, a former Indian spy must confront his past when he returns to lead an unsanctioned hostage-rescue mission.
name: Bard of Blood

overview: When India's most famous actress goes missing, the search for her chips away at the flawless facade of her life and family, revealing painful truths.
name: The Fame Game

overview: This documentary series chronicles the trials and triumphs of Bollywood's iconic Roshan family — musician Roshan Lal Nagrath, Rajesh, Rakesh and Hrithik.
name: The Roshans

overview: A link in their pasts leads an honest cop to a fugitive gang boss, whose cryptic warning spurs the officer on a quest to save Mumbai from cataclysm.
name: Sacred Games

overview: Following the police force as they investigate high-profile crimes in Delhi, this series has seasons inspired by both real and fictional events.
name: Delhi Crime

overview: Rana Naidu can solve any problem in Bollywood. But when his father is suddenly released from prison, the one mess he can’t handle may be his own.
name: Rana Naidu

overview: When upright cop Arjun Maitra takes on Kolkata's feared don Bagha and his henchmen, he must battle a broken system and navigate bloody gang wars.
name: Khakee: The Bengal Chapter

overview: After a foreign teenage tourist goes missing in a misty village, Kasturi, a frazzled local cop, is forced to team up with her city-bred successor, Angad, on a high-profile case that unearths skeletons and resurrects a long-forgotten legend of a savage serial killer in the woods.
name: Aranyak

overview: Relentlessly pursued by a powerful politician’s daughter who will do anything to make him hers, a man slips down a dark, risky path to reclaim his life.
name: Yeh Kaali Kaali Ankhein

overview: When an investigation into a pharma company hits close to home, five women launch a tiffin service with a secret ingredient.
name: Dabba Cartel

overview: When charming Prince Aviraaj meets Sophia, a self-made girl boss, the worlds of royalty and startups collide in a whirlwind of romance and ambition.
name: The Royals

overview: When IC 814 gets hijacked on its way to Delhi, hundreds of lives are at stake as the country faces its longest and most alarming aviation crisis.
name: IC 814: The Kandahar Hijack

overview: After the deadly Uphaar cinema fire, two grief-stricken parents navigate the loss of their kids and a dogged fight for justice.
name: Trial by Fire

overview: A grieving mother discovers the criminals behind her daughter's tragic death, and transforms from meek to merciless to get the real story.
name: Mai: A Mother's Rage

overview: A banking crisis forces CA topper Tribhuvan Mishra to take up sex work. Will this dual existence alleviate his troubles — or create entirely new ones?
name: Tribhuvan Mishra CA Topper

overview: When an upright officer accepts a job at Tihar Jail, he vows to make amends after witnessing cold-blooded corruption within its walls.
name: Black Warrant

overview: A newly minted military interrogator arrives at a covert detention center to discover that some of the terrorists held there are not of this world.
name: GHOUL

overview: Two teen cricket prodigies struggle against their overbearing father and a system stacked against them to realize their own ambitions and identities.
name: Selection Day

original_name: द रेलवे मेन - भोपाल की अनकही कहानी 1984
overview: India, 1984. After a deadly gas leaks from a factory in Bhopal, brave railway workers risk their lives to save others in the face of an unspeakable disaster.
name: The Railway Men - The Untold Story of Bhopal 1984

overview: A rebellious vampire with a broken tooth falls for a shy dentist on the streets of Kolkata but will human and mystical forces keep them apart?
name: Tooth Pari: When Love Bites

overview: Set in the near future, the Andaman and Nicobar Islands are quarantined from the rest of the world as a mystery disease engulfs them, prompting the islanders to attempt an unprecedented feat in human history - escaping the Kaala Paani.
name: Kaala Paani

overview: Short films follow young adults as they navigate the gamut of emotions that come with finding romantic connection in unexpected places.
name: Feels Like Ishq

overview: Comedian Kapil Sharma hosts this laugh-out-loud variety talk show with celebrity guests, hilarious antics and his signature supporting cast.
name: The Great Indian Kapil Show

overview: In a city of coaching centers known to train India’s finest collegiate minds, an earnest but unexceptional student and his friends navigate campus life.
name: Kota Factory

overview: From a satire to a psychological thriller, four short stories from celebrated auteur and writer Satyajit Ray are adapted for the screen in this series.
name: Ray

overview: Chaos collides with the letter of the law at District Court Patparganj, where quirky employees work to uphold justice — but not without a few objections.
name: Maamla Legal Hai

overview: A remote village becomes the arena of a breathless battle when an undead East India Company officer and his battalion of zombie redcoats attack a squad of modern-day soldiers.
name: Betaal

overview: When an NRI bridegroom is found dead days before his wedding in the countryside of Punjab, two cops must unravel the troubling case as turbulence unfolds in their own lives.
name: Kohrra

overview: When an unlikely group of misfits discovers a common enemy in the same ruthless yet superstitious politician, they plot a heist to exact revenge.
name: Choona

overview: The shocking murder of a journalist thrusts a leading crime reporter into a nexus of police, media and the Mumbai underworld as she fights for justice.
name: Scoop

overview: Three young friends in Goa plan to search an old villa for ghosts, but when a new family, accompanied by their attractive daughter moves in, the home's buried past resurfaces in chilling ways and the amateur ghost hunters must spring into action.
name: Typewriter

overview: After a disastrous set-up by their families, two teens strike up a tentative friendship at their summer program - but deeper feelings aren't far behind.
name: Mismatched

overview: A group of small-town young men run a lucrative phishing operation, until a corrupt politician wants in on their scheme -- and a cop wants to fight it.
name: Jamtara – Sabka Number Ayega

overview: Facing disapproving parents, a knotty love life and her own inner critic, an aspiring comic ditches her cushy but unsatisfying life to pursue stand-up.
name: Bhaag Beanie Bhaag

original_name: House of Secrets: The Burari Deaths
overview: Suicide, murder... or something else? This docuseries examines chilling truths and theories around the deaths of 11 members of a Delhi family.
name: House of Secrets: The Burari Deaths

overview: Three students from a poor neighborhood join an exclusive high school for Delhi elite where dark secrets and rumors ultimately lead to murder.
name: Class

overview: In the forgotten margins of the segregated communities of a dystopian future, a woman searches for the daughter that she lost upon her arrest years ago.
name: Leila

overview: Living under an alias, a former police informant is summoned to infiltrate a major drug empire but uncovers a dangerous connection to his dark past.
name: CAT

overview: Inspired by real events from Masaba Gupta's life, "Masaba Masaba" follows the designer's atypical journey through heterogeneous universes ranging from fashion to family, and documents her return to the singles market.
name: Masaba Masaba

overview: A cohabiting couple in their 20s navigate the ups and downs of work, modern-day relationships and finding themselves in contemporary Bengaluru.
name: Little Things

overview: An undercover assignment to expose a drug ring becomes a timid Mumbai constable's road to empowerment as she realizes her dormant sexuality's potential.
name: She

original_name: What the Love! with Karan Johar
overview: With help from celebrity guests and a glam squad, filmmaker Karan Johar mentors six singletons through their personal struggles as they look for love.
name: What the Love! with Karan Johar

overview: With satirical sketches, cheeky debates and blistering roasts, 16 of India's wittiest entertainers compete in teams to be named the ultimate comedy champs.
name: Comedy Premium League

overview: From boardrooms to society's margins, five ambitious women from various walks of life navigate dreams, desires and disappointments in modern Mumbai.
name: Bombay Begums

overview: In the cartel-run town of Gulaabgunj, an unprecedented opium deal pulls a big-city cop and a lovesick mechanic into its chaotic clutches.
name: Guns & Gulaabs

overview: Rising India-based comics Prashasti Singh, Kaneez Surka, Supriya Joshi, and Niveditha Prakasam bring no-holds-barred humor to this stand up series
name: Ladies Up

overview: Four singles looking for love face the ups and downs of connecting in real life and online. Will they choose virtual romance or go offline?
name: IRL: In Real Love

overview: A shy comedian gets his big break but soon realises he needs to murder people in order to keep his mojo on stage.
name: Hasmukh

overview: Bheem, a fun-loving toddler with incredible strength, is heading to school. Join his classroom adventures as he makes new friends and plenty of mischief!
name: Mighty Bheem's Playtime

overview: As a righteous cop pursues a merciless criminal in Bihar, he finds himself navigating a deadly chase and a moral battle mired in corruption.
name: Khakee: The Bihar Chapter

overview: A series of mutilated bodies and taunting notes left outside a Delhi jail sends police hunting for a seasoned killer with a grudge against the system.
name: Indian Predator: The Butcher of Delhi

original_name: Alma Matters: Inside the IIT Dream
overview: In a "nation of middle-class" the IIT dream involves clearing the world's toughest public exam for guaranteed lifelong success. Life is not an exam though. It's a hustle, one that nobody trains them for. The result? Eternal tumult.
name: Alma Matters: Inside the IIT Dream

original_name: इंडियन प्रेडेटर: मर्डर इन अ कोर्टरूम
overview: In 2004, a brutal predator was lynched in a courtroom. This is the story of the community he terrorized - and the vengeance they unleashed.
name: Indian Predator: Murder in a Courtroom

original_name: इंडियन प्रीडेटर: एक सीरियल किलर की डायरी
overview: When a suspect is found in a journalist's murder, the case is considered closed until a secret diary suggests 13 more victims — and possible cannibalism.
name: Indian Predator: The Diary of a Serial Killer

original_name: Krish, Trish and Baltiboy: Bharat Hain Hum
overview: Three animal storytellers called Krish, Trish and Baltiboy tell the story of India's fierce struggle for freedom through great moments of courage and sacrifice.
name: Krish, Trish and Baltiboy: Bharat Hain Hum

overview: Bheem and his friends must do whatever it takes to stop Tabora and his evil aunt from finding the Agni Chakra and reviving the villainous Kirmada.
name: Chhota Bheem Kirmada

overview: Sensing danger, the Prithvi Chakra causes the island of Bali to sink. Now Bheem, Chutki and the gang must save its people and defeat the evil Rangda.
name: Chhota Bheem Rangda

overview: Chhota Bheem and his friends learn all about the adventures of Bhima, a mythical hero who possesses superhuman strength.
name: Chhota Bheem aur Gadadhari Bheem
